column2: if you've been dying to try the raved Uchi
column3: I would say give it a try. I would be surprised if
column5: you find this to be an impeccable restaurant. I don't find Uchi and Uchiko in Austin to be perfect either
column6: but not bad for a splurge meal for inventive small plates and the chance to have a truly delightful bite here and there. I strongly consider the value I get for the money I spend when rating restaurants
column7: and Uchi Houston scores low for value in my book.
